ValidationRule.description: When the Reason is "Product Capabilities within DAM", then the field "Product Reason" should be filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Reason__c, 'Product Capabilities within DAM'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Product_Reason__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A product reason is required when loss reason is "Product Capabilities within DAM".
